overview: Carlos Domenech oversees all financial, human resources, and information functions for SunEdison. His expertise in global supply chain functions and experience with multi-national enterprises make him an invaluable component of the SunEdison management team, for whom he provides strategic insight and financial expertise. Working with world-class financial partners, including leading venture capital firms, investment banks, and investors, Domenech develops innovative financing that supports the ground-breaking SunEdison solar energy services model.
